head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SESSLER, ANITA LOUISE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SESSLER, ANITA LOUISE

block.p: SESSLER-Anita Louise. May 13, 2000. Daughter of the late Jonas and Sydelle. She is survived by her husband Robert, sons, Scott and Lee, and daughters-in-law, Andrea and Madeline, and grandchildren, Ryan and Jordan. Sister of Stevie and sister-in-law of Rosalie. Funeral services May 16th at 11:15 A.M., at The Riverside, 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue. She will be greatly missed but her memory will forever be in our hearts.
